ParticleName.description: The name of the .cemt file this object uses (without the .cemt extension).

ColorR.description: The amount of red color in this particle.

ColorG.description: The amount of green color in this particle.

ColorB.description: The amount of blue color in this particle.

ColorA.description: The amount of alpha in this particle.

Name.description: The name of the cue played by this object.

Is3D.description: Whether the sound played by this object is three-dimensional.

Volume.description: The volume of the sound played by this object.

Trigger.description: What activates this object. Range means the object is activated simply by the player coming within its range. Message means this object needs to be triggered by another object.

SectorID.description: The ID of the terrain sector this particle gets loaded-in with?
